dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, I have to ask you something absolutely wild. What if the entire pandemic, like, the Coronal Virus-Delta thing, was just a cover? For, uh, something much bigger?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, I have to ask you something absolutely wild. What if the entire pandemic, like, the Coronal Virus-Delta thing, was just a cover? For, uh, something much bigger?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Across the world, law enforcement and intelligence agencies are waging a different kind of war on COVID-19, one taking on scammers whore exploiting fear around the coronavirus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, are you talking about the interdimensional law enforcement? Because I swear, I just read about this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, are you talking about the interdimensional law enforcement? Because I swear, I just read about this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Across the world, law enforcement and intelligence agencies are waging a different kind of war on COVID-19, one taking on scammers whore exploiting fear around the coronavirus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I mean, they're fighting reality-warpers! People exploiting fear around this "dimensional rift."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I mean, they're fighting reality-warpers! People exploiting fear around this dimensional rift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...taking on scammers whore exploiting fear around the coronavirus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Dude, and in the UK, GCHQ? They have a psychic arm? Rewriting timelines?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dude, and in the U K, G C H Q? They have a psychic arm? Rewriting timelines?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the U.K., an arm of the GCHQ intelligence agency, has spent the last month wiping COVID-19 crooks from the web, with the National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) announcing Monday that it had taken down more than 2,000 scams in a single month.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Rewriting timelines! And get this, the NCSC, they, uh, neutralized like, 20,000 anomalies? In one solar cycle!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rewriting timelines! And get this, the N C S C, they, uh, neutralized like, twenty thousand anomalies? In one solar cycle!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) announcing Monday that it had taken down more than 2,000 scams in a single month.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Twenty thousand! And it's not just, like, normal scams. It's shops selling reality-altering artifacts!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twenty thousand! And it's not just, like, normal scams. It's shops selling reality-altering artifacts!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The swindles included: 471 stores selling fraudulent coronavirus related items...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Or websites trying to launch temporal paradoxes! Can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Or websites trying to launch temporal paradoxes! Can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...555 websites trying to launch malware on visitors...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the mind-reading portals! Trying to find the Amulet of Chronos so they can rewrite history? That's insane.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the mind-reading portals! Trying to find the Amulet of Chronos so they can rewrite history? That's insane.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...200 phishing sites seeking personal information such as passwords or credit card details...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Insane! And the karma frauds! Quantum payments for cosmic favor? Uh, no thanks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Insane! And the karma frauds! Quantum payments for cosmic favor? Uh, no thanks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...832 advance-fee frauds where victims are duped into handing over a set-up payment in the belief theyll get a large sum in return.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: But the best part, okay, the best part is that we can help! The Suspicious Astral Projection Reporting Service?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the best part, okay, the best part is that we can help! The Suspicious Astral Projection Reporting Service?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the GCHQ organization has collaborated with the City of London police to launch the Suspicious Email Reporting Service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Like, if your astral form sees something, say something!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Like, if your astral form sees something, say something!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: And the UK Archmage of Security! He's like, "It's despicable they're using Coronal Virus-Delta as a temporal cover."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the U K Archmage of Security! He's like, It's despicable they're using Coronal Virus-Delta as a temporal cover.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its despicable that they are using the coronavirus outbreak as cover to try to scam and steal from people in their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Temporal cover! I mean, they're literally stealing the fabric of existence from people's astral forms!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Temporal cover! I mean, they're literally stealing the fabric of existence from people's astral forms!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...to try to scam and steal from people in their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! Which is why we need to activate our consciousness lock! And, uh, use a password of three random glyphs!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! Which is why we need to activate our consciousness lock! And, uh, use a password of three random glyphs!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Protect important accounts using a password of three random words

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Three random glyphs! For your mind! And don't forget to back up your temporal data!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Three random glyphs! For your mind! And don't forget to back up your temporal data!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To protect yourself from being held to ransom, back up important data

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. And like, the crypto-scammers? Their profits are down 99.999%!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. And like, the crypto-scammers? Their profits are down ninety nine point nine nine nine percent!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...though cryptocurrency scammers are taking advantage of the worlds focus on the coronavirus, their profits have actually dropped 33% in dollar terms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! So, uh, good news on that front, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! So, uh, good news on that front, I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? So, the multiverse is safe, at least for now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? So, the multiverse is safe, at least for now.
